attributes.action: Allow hair, beauty and gyms to reopen.
attributes.additional_details: Essential stores are allowed to remain open but many contain items that are not essential to every day life. you are free to enter these shops as many times as you like over and over, coming into contact with100s of people, some with no PPE or masks.All hair, beauty and gyms etc already wear this & have proven they do not contribute to case numbers as much as other settings.Business & people are hit hard with little financial help especially those who are not "eligible" damaging livelihoods
attributes.background: Allow all gyms, sports, fitness, salons, beauty, nails and mobile therapists to remain open under all tiers & national lockdowns.
